name: shock-drive
effect: Held by genesect : Holder’s buster is yellow, and its techno blast is electric-type.
short_effect: Grants Genesect a yellow, Electric-type Techno Blast.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Genesect’s Techno Blast move so it becomes Electric type.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Genesect’s Techno Blast move so it becomes Electric type.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A cassette to be held by Genesect. It changes Genesect’s Techno Blast move so it becomes Electric type.
